instruction: Explain AMD GPUs to a 10 year old
output: AMD GPUs are special computer chips that help make games look really pretty and run smoothly! Think of them like super-fast artists that can draw thousands of pictures every second.
ROCm is AMD's open-source software platform for GPU computing. It allows developers to run high-performance computing applications on AMD GPUs.
LoRA is an efficient fine-tuning method that adds small trainable matrices to existing model layers instead of updating all parameters.
